html-css.title: HTML & CSS
html-css.summary: Course to learn HTML & CSS for beginners.

more-html-css.title: More HTML & CSS
more-html-css.summary: A collection of various topics around HTML & CSS.

hello-dart.title: Hello Dart: Introduction to Programming
hello-dart.summary: Hello Dart is a visual and playful introduction to programming with Dart.

dart-kanban.title: Dart Kanban: Build your Task Manager
dart-kanban.summary:
Tutorial about how to build a Kanban-Style Todo Board with Dart.
Note: This course is currently only available in German.

greenfoot-kara.title: GreenfootKara
greenfoot-kara.summary: GreenfootKara is a visual and interactive introduction to programming based on the Greenfoot IDE. An entire beginners course of 16-20 lessons.

gamegrid-kara.title: GameGridKara
gamegrid-kara.summary: GameGridKara is an introduction to programming with the mini-world Kara. All scenarios can be used in any IDE like Eclipse, Netbeans or BlueJ.

javafx-8-tutorial.title: JavaFX 8 Tutorial
javafx-8-tutorial.summary: Seven-part tutorial series for learning JavaFX.

dart-drag-and-drop.title: Dart Drag and Drop
dart-drag-and-drop.summary: Drag and Drop for Dart web apps with mouse and touch support.

dart-event-bus.title: Dart Event Bus
dart-event-bus.summary: An Event Bus library for Dart for decoupling applications.
